data.actual_result: The real everyone is pinged and shit hits the fan
data.expected_result: As on Desktop, this should ping the "fake everyone role" *even if you select the real one*
data.short_description: Doing an everyone ping from mobile uses real everyone instead of custom role
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a role called "everyone" and make it mentionable - Be a user with admin perms or "mention everyone" perm - Type `@everyone` in a channel, and send the message.
